column1: #Text=( Persian : تبریز , Azerbaijani : Təbriz ) is the capital of East Azerbaijan province , in the Azerbaijan region of Iran .
#Text=It is a modern industrialized Iranian city with signs of civilization dating back 2,500 years .

#Text=Having some of most famous museums , holding some of the cultural events , and harboring a couple of the most prestigious Iranian universities , the city is considered a major hub for science and culture in Iran .
